lines.i: Information about the protocol used by EMS personnel to direct the clinical care of the patient

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.7"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67663-5" EMS protocol Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10713)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Protocol Section" (CONF:11021)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:11024)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Protocol Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:11026)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Candidate Patient Registry Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.94)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67663-5" EMS protocol Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10713)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Protocol Section" (CONF:11021)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:11024)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Protocol Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.93)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [0..1] entry (CONF:11026)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Candidate Patient Registry Type (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.94)
